ygData.subject: Re: Jewel Craft Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: I have also noticed a big difference in prices on different servers.  Example: On Brell Serilis the Stein of Mogguk goes for 250 to 300pp on Antonica (more
ygData.messageBody:
I have also noticed a big difference in prices on different servers. Example:
On Brell Serilis the Stein of Mogguk goes for 250 to 300pp on Antonica (more
exensive on the other continents). On Nameless I saw someone auctioning the
Stein for 150pp on the Faydwer continent. I'd be curious to see what price
differences are with the jewlrey.

-Ezrae

Rich Hitz wrote:

> From: Rich Hitz <Rich.Hitz@...>
>
> Ok, I know this is a sensitive subject and ultimately subject to what server
> you are on and the prices accepted by the general public on that server.
> However, so as to not undersell my product to the populace of Norrath, can
> anyone give me a general guide for items made and lowest price you would
> sell them for? I realize Silver may not sell for much on the established
> servers and on PVP+ they would rather kill you for your wears, as if you
> would sell them anyway. I am merely looking for a "suggested retail price".
> Also what zones result in the best prices?
>
> Another thing that I saw was that Jewel Craft caps at 200 with Gold being
> Trivial then. Is this true? I thought there was no cap on trade skills.
>
> --
> Bahir
> 4th Season DE Enchanter
> (soon to be Master Jeweler and level 50 in the next 3 days)
>
>
